items.sentence: Don\'t worry about things that aren\'t important.
It\'s no secret that Tom doesn\'t agree with you.
I\'m not surprised you didn\'t go there with Tom.
I\'m sorry, Tom, I didn\'t realize you were here.
If you don\'t hurry, you\'ll miss the last train.
The man who\'s sitting next to Tom is his father.
The truth is that I didn\'t want to eat with Tom.
Tom was the first one in our class to find a job.
Tom was the first one to notice Mary had arrived.
Tom was the first one to notice Mary was unhappy.
